thread.title: Development-Finance Groups Widen Inquiry Into Abraaj Funds

author: William Louch
title: Development-Finance Groups Widen Inquiry Into Abraaj Funds
text:
Two development-finance organizations are widening an investigation into the Abraaj Group, a Dubai-based private-equity firm that manages money on their behalf, according to people familiar with the investigation.
The World Bank’s International Finance Corp. and U.K.-based CDC Group PLC are part of a group of investors investigating whether Abraaj misused any money they committed to a $1 billion health-care fund raised in 2016. The two organizations now are seeking audits of other Abraaj-managed funds they backed to determine... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
